main event: On March 6, 1954, multiple witnesses observed a UFO at Keesler AFB, described as translucent and white, moving erratically at high altitudes.
interesting points: The objects were seen drifting at about 20 mph at altitudes around 50,000 feet for about 5 minutes., Observers included Air Force personnel and a control tower operator., One witness mentioned having seen similar objects on several occasions., The object had a streamer hanging from it which appeared to be a quarter of its diameter., The sighting prompted an investigation with a military aircraft being dispatched to identify the object.
sighted object: brilliant, translucent white stars or a disc-shaped object
location: Keesler Air Force Base, Mississippi, USA
witness description: Air Force personnel including a control tower operator, and Captains John and Jane Doe
